The tiger roared, showing it's long white teeth.  It looked at 
Lunarpine and roared again.  It leaped at Lunarpine ready to bite his 
head off.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> The tigers hesitation gave lunarpine the chance he needed, he drew 
> his rifle and turned it toward the tiger.
> "OK kitty one way or another we're gonna see what you're made of, 
If 
> you got the guts that is."
> 
> he took aim at its head.
>
